newsitem.title: USA: American Healthcorp to spin off AmSurg.
newsitem.headline: American Healthcorp to spin off AmSurg.

text.p: American Healthcorp Inc said on Tuesday it has filed plans to spin off its 59 percent owned AmSurg Corp unit to American Healthcorp stockholders.
The distribution is subject to a Internal Revenue Service ruling that would call the deal substantially tax-free to shareholders, American Healthcorp said.
American Healthcorp stockholders are expected to be subject to a federal income tax with respect to 1.5 percent of the shares of AmSurg received, the company said.
American Healthcorp said it expects the distribution to take place shortly after the Internal Revenue Service ruling.
AmSurg shares would begin trading as a separate public company on the Nasdaq Stock Market on the date of the distribution, American Healthcorp said.
